verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> "Come <S%H935><s%> with all of your household <S%H1004><s%> into the ship, <S%H8392><s%> for I have seen <S%H7200><s%> your righteousness <S%H6662><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> generation. <S%H1755><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> seven pairs of every clean <S%H2889><s%> animal <S%H929><s%> with you, <S%H376><s%> the male and his female. <S%H802><s%> Of the animals <S%H929><s%> that are not clean, <S%H2889><s%> take two, <S%H8147><s%> the male <S%H376><s%> and his female. <S%H802><s%>

Also of the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> and seven, <S%H2145><s%> male and female, <S%H5347><s%> to keep <S%H2421><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth. <S%H776><s%>

In <S%H5750><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> I will cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> for forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights. <S%H3915><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> living thing <S%H3351><s%> that I have made, <S%H6213><s%> I will destroy <S%H4229><s%> from the surface of the ground. <S%H6440><s%>"
Noah <S%H5146><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> everything that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded him. <S%H6680><s%>
Noah <S%H5146><s%> was six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when the flood <S%H3999><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> came on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Noah <S%H5146><s%> went into the ship <S%H8392><s%> with his sons, <S%H1121><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' wives, <S%H802><s%> because of <S%H6440><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the flood. <S%H3999><s%>
Clean <S%H2889><s%> animals, <S%H2889><s%> animals that are not clean, birds, <S%H5775><s%> and everything that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the ground <S%H127><s%>

went <S%H935><s%> by <S%H8147><s%> pairs <S%H8147><s%> to Noah <S%H5146><s%> into the ship, <S%H8392><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female, <S%H5347><s%> as <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Noah. <S%H5146><s%>
It happened after the seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the flood <S%H3999><s%> came on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

In <S%H8141><s%> the six <S%H8337><s%> hundredth <S%H3967><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%>'s life, <S%H2416><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> on the same <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> all the fountains <S%H4599><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> deep <S%H8415><s%> were burst open, <S%H1234><s%> and the sky <S%H8064><s%>'s windows <S%H699><s%> were opened. <S%H6605><s%>
The rain <S%H1653><s%> was on the earth <S%H776><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights. <S%H3915><s%>

In the same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> and Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth, <S%H3315><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah, <S%H5146><s%> and Noah <S%H5146><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> and the three <S%H7969><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with them, <S%H8392><s%> entered into the ship;

they, <S%H1992><s%> and every animal <S%H2416><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> all the livestock <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every bird <S%H5775><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> every bird <S%H6833><s%> of every sort. <S%H3671><s%>

They went to Noah <S%H5146><s%> into <S%H935><s%> the ship, <S%H8392><s%> by <S%H8147><s%> pairs <S%H8147><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> with <S%H834><s%> the breath <S%H7307><s%> of life in them. <S%H2416><s%>

Those who went in, <S%H935><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> of all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh shut him in. <S%H5462><s%>

The flood <S%H3999><s%> was forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%> The waters <S%H4325><s%> increased, <S%H7235><s%> and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> the ship, <S%H8392><s%> and it was lifted up <S%H7311><s%> above the earth. <S%H776><s%>

The waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed, <S%H1396><s%> and increased <S%H7235><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> on the earth; <S%H776><s%> and the ship floated <S%H3212><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the waters. <S%H4325><s%>

The waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%> All the high <S%H1364><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> that were under <S%H8478><s%> the whole sky <S%H8064><s%> were covered. <S%H3680><s%>
The waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed fifteen <S%H6240><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> upward, <S%H4605><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were covered. <S%H3680><s%>

All flesh <S%H1320><s%> died <S%H1478><s%> that moved <S%H7430><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> including birds, <S%H5775><s%> livestock, <S%H929><s%> animals, <S%H2416><s%> every creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creeps <S%H8317><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and every man. <S%H120><s%>
All in whose nostrils <S%H639><s%> was the breath <S%H5397><s%> of the spirit of life, <S%H2416><s%> of all that was on the dry <S%H2724><s%> land, <S%H4191><s%> died.

Every living thing <S%H3351><s%> was destroyed <S%H4229><s%> that was on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the ground, <S%H127><s%> including man, <S%H120><s%> livestock, <S%H929><s%> creeping things, <S%H7431><s%> and birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky. <S%H8064><s%> They were destroyed <S%H4229><s%> from the earth. <S%H776><s%> Only <S%H389><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> was left, <S%H7604><s%> and those who <S%H834><s%> were with him in the ship. <S%H8392><s%>
The waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
